text.section:
A subscription for stock of a corporation which is not yet formed is irrevocable for a period of 3 months, unless:
The subscription agreement provides otherwise; or
Every subscriber consents to the revocation of the subscription.
Unless the subscription agreement provides otherwise, a subscription is not void or unenforceable solely because less than all of the authorized stock is subscribed for.

Unless the subscription agreement provides otherwise, a subscription for stock, whether made before or after the corporation is formed, shall be paid in full or in installments at the times set by the board of directors.
